text:
Long Island City, Queens: Viewing east along the extensive railroad yards of the Pennsylvania and Long Island Railroads, seen from the Queens Boulevard overpass. On the left are shown the rears of factories, all fronting on Northern Boulevard. They are: The National Casket Company factory, the Waldorf Astoria Service Corporation, the Ford Motor Company, and the Ronzoni Macaroni Company buildings.

Ewing Galloway

About 1927
title: Queens: Long Island City - [Pennsylvania and Long Island Railroad yards.]
